idea:
eBaajaar is an Omni-Channel Farm-to-Fork Agri-Tech startup. Our mobile based e-marketplaces currently operates in FnV segment for Mumbai market. It connects consumers, food processors, vendors and farmers. This app enables end users to select, bargain and order fresh fruits & vegetables which gets delivered in less than 2 hours of confirmation. We are currently testing procurement directly from farm around Mumbai. In the test phase we were successful in transporting select FnV from farm to stores in less than 15 hours at a lower cost than traditional supply chain model. 

Being a tech company, our vision is to use AI to minimise food wastage (by predicting demand of particular area) and IoT to streamline supply chain. The overall aim is to reduce wastage and ensure higher value share for farmers and vendors while providing fresh supply to end users.
name: eBaajaar

idea:
Sudhir Gavhal is entrepreneur, who has successfully setup to startups, One in the area of Product Sourcing, Supply Chain Management and Another in the area of blockchain based method to increase and protect trees and plants.

Apart from this Sudhir is engaged in creating various niche brands and innovative ideas. Sudhir personally owns about 20+ Trademarks, Various copyrights and Involved in creating process and technology Patents (these are under drafting / examination stages)

Sudhir is also a wildlife photographer and published a book MARVELLOUS WILDCATS.
name: DIRECTPAX GLOBAL SOURCING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Rezo Technologies Private Limited – ‘Rezofin’ is a tech-enabled cloud based platform that connects large corporate buyers with their suppliers helping them discount invoices or finance invoices through banks or individual financiers at market-determined prices in an automated, transparent and secure way.

We get all the required data in real time as far as possible, such that we are able to arrive at a negotiated middle ground that works for all parties involved. With the help of a few controllable parameters, the suppliers can minimise their cost of borrowing and the buyers or financiers can maximise their returns. Our intelligent algorithm matches the above requirements and calculates the resulting discounts dynamically. We are creating efficiency in the system by incorporating technology and removing the intermediaries. The hefty premiums currently charged by the intermediaries are added back to the supply chain.

Our vision is to become default source for Working Capital financing and help liquidity flow freely between the trading parties. Rezofin is addressing a problem that has a global market opportunity. It has the capacity to benefit the entrepreneurial system in India that has millions of MSMEs facing a $198 Billion debt. We plan to stop at nothing but an excellent product that will help support the backbone of every economy.
name: REZO TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Shekru is a smartphone based free dual-language application that provides access to educational, skill development and financial resources in agriculture through events, schemes and voices. The pilot is focused in Maharashtra for now predominantly, the information is presented in English and Marathi.
name: Shekru

idea: Adoroi Tech is a Patented Multi-farious technology platform that combines web-tech and tele-tech, to enable development of very unique app use-ceses in field of Cyber Security, Fintech, Marketing Analytics and other.
name: Adoroi Tech Ventures Pvt Ltd

idea:
Etrends Technologies is a 11 year old company in the IT field.
ETrends Technologies Pvt. Ltd. provides bankable software services in the area of Enterprise Business Applications. It is one of the reputed IT company in INDIA to provide range of fully customizable solutions for corporate governance to suite the requirements of your company.
LASER: Enterprise Applications by ETRENDS are content-enabled workflow solutions designed specifically for Enterprise Risk Management, Legal Compliance Management, Internal Audit Management and Internal Financial Control Management.
The few Products developed by Etrends are :
1. Laser Enterprise Risk Management System (LERMS)
2. Laser Audit Reporting System (LARS)
3. Laser Legal Compliance System (LLCS)
4. Laser Internal Control Management System (LICM)
Visit www.lasergrc.com to know more about GRC offerings by ETrends.
Laser GRC Solutions
name: Etrends Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
